name: Garden of Enigmas
description:
[Recommended to play in full-screen mode]

This is a game mode for GGJ2022HK, theme: duality 

Inspired by the bistable silhouette illusion, we think the object rotating clockwise and counterclockwise at the same time is also a kind of duality. In the game, you will take a tour of the puzzle garden and solve the puzzles using the rotating statue mechanism. Please enjoy!

Made by:

  1. LI Honglin
  2. ZHAO Zian
  3. Sweta Das
  4. PAN Zewen
  5. Jer Tao LEE
